Minute Entry for proceedings held before Magistrate Judge Bernard G. Skomal: Change of Plea Hearing as to Jose Alfredo Pacheco-Ramos held on 2/12/2015. Guilty plea entered by Jose Alfredo Pacheco-Ramos (1) to Count 2 of the Information. PSR Waived, Sentence Without PSR Hearing held on 2/12/2015 for Jose Alfredo Pacheco-Ramos (1), Count 1 of the Information is dismissed without prejudice on the government's oral motion. Count 2 of the Information, defendant sentenced to time served. Penalty assessment $25.00 waived; no fine. Abstract issued to USM. Defendant appeal rights waived. Judge John A. Houston is no longer assigned to case and Magistrate Judge Bernard G. Skomal is now assigned to the case. The new case number is 15CR0144-BGS. (Interpreter Nelly Sztuden). (CD# 2/12/2015 BGS 13:36-13:45). (Plaintiff Attorney Steven Lee, AUSA). (Defendant Attorney Sam Eilers, FD). (no document attached) (jer) (Entered: 02/12/2015)
